name: HS
short_description: HS (HyperScript) is an interpretive lang with C-like syntax for event-driven apps on UNIX, Win/NT, VMS, Mac.   HS supports: HTTP, SSL, SQL (ORACLE, MySQL, PostGres, SQLSERVER),  SECS/GEM (SECS1, HSMS),  XML, JSON, Serial (RS232) comm, GD (gdlib).
